# ggsegPower <img src='man/figures/logo.png' align="right" height="138.5" />

<!-- badges: start -->
[![DOI](https://zenodo.org/badge/417497619.svg)](https://zenodo.org/badge/latestdoi/417497619)
[![R-CMD-check](https://github.com/ggseg/ggsegPower/actions/workflows/R-CMD-check.yaml/badge.svg)](https://github.com/ggseg/ggsegPower/actions/workflows/R-CMD-check.yaml)
<!-- badges: end -->

This package contains dataset for plotting the Power atlas with ggseg and ggseg3d.

Power, J. D., Cohen, A. L., Nelson, S. M., Wig, G. S., Barnes, K. A., Church, J. A., ... & Petersen, S. E. (2011). Functional network organization of the human brain. Neuron, 72(4), 665-678.
[PubMed](https://www.ncbi.nlm.nih.gov/pmc/articles/PMC3222858/)

To learn how to use these atlases, please look at the documentation for
[ggseg](https://ggseg.github.io/ggseg/) and
[ggseg3d](https://ggseg.github.io/ggseg3d).

## Installation

We recommend installing the ggseg-atlases through the ggseg [r-universe](https://ggseg.r-universe.dev/ui#builds):

```{r}
#| label: install-r-universe
#| eval: false
options(repos = c(
  ggseg = "https://ggseg.r-universe.dev",
  CRAN = "https://cloud.r-project.org"
))

install.packages("ggsegPower")
```

You can install the released version of ggsegPower from [GitHub](https://github.com/) with:

```r
# install.packages("remotes")
remotes::install_github("ggseg/ggsegPower")
```

## Example

```{r}
#| label: 2d-plot
#| fig-height: 7
library(ggseg)
library(ggsegPower)
library(ggplot2)

ggplot() +
  geom_brain(
    atlas = power(),
    mapping = aes(fill = label),
    position = position_brain(hemi ~ view),
    show.legend = FALSE
  ) +
  scale_fill_manual(values = power()$palette, na.value = "grey") +
  theme_void()
```

```{r}
#| label: 3d-example
#| eval: false
library(ggseg3d)

ggseg3d(atlas = power()) |>
  add_glassbrain() |>
  pan_camera("right lateral")
```

```{r}
#| label: 3d-snapshot
#| include: false
#| eval: !expr (file.exists(Sys.which("chrome")) || file.exists(Sys.which("chromium"))) && !nzchar(Sys.getenv("CI"))
library(ggseg3d)

ggseg3d(atlas = power()) |>
  add_glassbrain(hemisphere = "left") |>
  pan_camera("right lateral") |>
  snapshot_brain("man/figures/README-3d-plot.png")
```

```{r}
#| label: 3d-include
#| echo: false
#| eval: !expr file.exists("man/figures/README-3d-plot.png")
knitr::include_graphics("man/figures/README-3d-plot.png")
```
